item.title: MBTI Type ESTJ
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Preferred Work Tasks Require thorough analysis Practical planning and organizational skills Process control and responsibility Preferred Work Environment Will fit best where the norms are clear The culture is performance driven.
